oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Comment on the effects of overlayer thicknesses on the electrical resistivity of polycrystalline Cu/Cr double-layered thin films - Comment
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: VITTA, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The oscillatory behaviour of the electrical resistivity of Cu/Cr double layers where the Cr layer thickness is >7.5 nm has been attributed to the incommensurate-commensurate phase transition in Cr [1]. The present work shows that the resistivity variation is not due to the incommensurate-commensurate phase transition in Cr.
